Description: KEWEENAW NATIONAL HISTORICAL PARK  NHP  PRESERVATION GRANT PROGRAM IS TO PROVIDE KEWEENAW NHP ADVISORY COMMISSION ASSISTANCE IN THE FULFILLMENT OF LEGISLATED DUTIES TO INCLUDE CARRYING OUT HISTORICAL, EDUCATION, OR CULTURAL PROGRAMS WHICH ENHANCE UNDERSTANDING OF PRESERVATION OF THE HISTORICAL AND CULTURAL RESOURCES IN THE KEWEENAW NHP AND SURROUNDING AREA ON MICHIGAN S KEWEENAW PENINSULA  ANNUAL FUNDING CONTRIBUTES TO COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH ADMINISTRATION OF THE CIVIC AND COMMERCIAL HISTORIC DISTRICT ORDINANCE AND PROJECTS THAT ADDRESS PRESERVATION OF HISTORIC OR CULTURAL RESOURCES RELATED TO THE STORY OF COPPER ON THE KEWEENAW PENINSULA  BENEFICIARIES INCLUDE PUBLIC NONPROFIT INSTITUTION ORGANIZATION KEWEENAW NHP ADVISORY COMMISSION, KEWEENAW NHP HERITAGE SITES, LOCAL OR REGIONAL UNITS OF GOVERNMENT  ACADEMIC INSTITUTIONS, OR FEDERALLY RECOGNIZED INDIAN TRIBES

PURPOSE OF AWARD (SUMMARY OF THE GOALS AND OBJECTIVES OF THE PROJECT): PROVIDE FUNDING TO KEWEENAW NATIONAL HISTORIC PARK ADVISORY COMMISSION TO ASSIST THE FULFILLMENT OF THEIR LEGISLATED DUTIES. THE PROGRAM MAKES POSSIBLE FUNDING TO THE VILLAGE OF CALUMET TO COVER A PORTION OF COSTS ASSOCIATED WITH ADMINISTRATION OF THE CIVIC AND COMMERCIAL HISTORIC DISTRICT ORDINANCE.SUMMARY OF PROJECT SPECIFIC ACTIVITIES: ASSISTS KEWEENAW NATIONAL HISTORIC PARK IN THE FULFILLMENT OF MISSION CRITICAL HISTORIC PRESERVATION IN THE VILLAGE OF CALUMET CIVIC AND COMMERCIAL HISTORIC DISTRICT.PERFORMANCE GOALS INCLUDING MILESTONES AND EXPECTED OUTCOMES: CARRY OUT THE CALUMET HISTORIC DISTRICT ORDINANCE WHICH ESTABLISHES HISTORIC PRESERVATION AS A PUBLIC PURPOSE.BENEFICIARIES: PUBLIC NONPROFIT INSTITUTION/ORGANIZATION: KEWEENAW NHP ADVISORY COMMISSION; KEWEENAW NHP HERITAGE SITES; LOCAL OR REGIONAL UNITS OF GOVERNMENT; ACADEMIC INSTITUTIONS, OR FEDERALLY RECOGNIZED INDIAN TRIBES.
RESTORATION AND PRESERVATION OF QUINCY MINING COMPANY 1918 HOIST HOUSE
VILLAGE OF CALUMET HISTORIC DISTRICT COMMISSION GRANTS AGREEMENT
